Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from GenAI was a lot quicker than from teacher and could therefore be Implemented sooner

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes, feedback from AI felt less condescending

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes AI feedback was off topic or used items that were not within course parameters. Also felt less trustworthy than a teacher and I would often check (Google search) that it was still correct
